summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2029 for the improvement of Fifth Avenue Northeast, from East Forty-seventh Street to a connection with existing sewer six (6) feet south of the south margin of East Forty-second Street, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing sewers therein of proper dimensions and materials, together with such wyes, openings, manholes, catch basins, flush tanks and other appurtenances necessary for the proper sewerage and drainage of said district; under Ordinance No. 20434, and levying and assessing the amount thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
